pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The Contoso Employee Giving Program (Give)

Give helps employees make a difference in their communities by matching the time and money they donate to eligible organizations. Give also supports companywide giving events and helps employees find volunteer opportunities with eligible US-based nonprofit organizations.

Donate

LEARN MORE

Volunteer

LEARN MORE

Match money

LEARN MORE

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Were excited to announce a Contoso task force charged with the mission of localizing to help communities in need. We will create regional teams, staffed by Contoso employees around the globe. These teams will deploy assistance in the event of a natural disaster or community hardship in any of the locations we operate. Giving back is one of our core beliefs at Contoso and we hope you can help us.

Contoso is passionate about the world we live in. Restoring and maintaining environmental health is a priority for us. Which is why we are pleased to launch a new campaign designed to restore the natural resources in the countries we travel and work in. We want to ensure that these areas thrive by routinely planting native fruit trees for everyone to benefit from.
I wanted to highlight why I care about the charities I donate to.
Music Mania is a nonprofit that needs your help - here's why.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: How to make your volunteer hours count!

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Little-known fact - did you know that Contoso Electronics will pay nonprofits for the time that you volunteer with them? Imagine that!

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: We have distributed the updated medical packages pamphlet and we realize all these changes will raise some questions. Make an appointment with your HR representative today to help navigate all the new medical benefits packages and changes from earlier years.
Contoso encourages our employees to come to us with any issue they might have. We want them to feel comfortable talking with upper management and know that theyre being heard.

We have distributed the updated medical packages pamphlet and we realize all these changes will raise some questions. Make an appointment with your HR representative today to help navigate all the new medical benefits packages and changes from earlier years.
Gym remodel is complete. You now have access 24/7 access to our newly remodeled company gym. Check out our spin class schedule and other seasonal available classes.
We will be switching to a new healthcare provider - here's what you need to know.
Looking for ways to beat the heat while still staying active? Here are some tips!
Working for a global company, provides all sorts of opportunities for those looking to take on exciting roles overseas.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As enrollment season begins, we wanted to inform you of the changes on this year's choices. From new dental plans to more flexibility with your health savings account.

A bit about me:

 

Carlos started at Contoso right out of university in 1990. He began his career as a software design engineer, working on various clients, servers and services during his tenure. Carlos has a master?s degree in computer science from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst and a bachelor?s degree in computer science from Indian Institute of Technology, Madras. Carlos also serves on the board of directors for Give @ Contoso, where he is co-developing a program to help ensure compassion is taught in every primary school in the U.S. He also sits on the Board of Trustees for the Paley Center for Media.

As Director of Product Support at Contoso Charlotte focuses on making Contoso an exceptional place for employees to work, and ensures that the company is creating a culture that attracts and inspires the world?s most passionate talent. Waltson earned her bachelor?s degree in applied mathematics and economics, magna cum laude, from Harvard University. In addition, she holds an M.B.A. from the Stanford University Graduate School of Business.
